detail_desc: Sturdy hat in felted wool with an indented crown and corded band. Lightly padded sweatband. Width of brim 9 cm.

Waist bag in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Two-way zip at the front, one zipped outer compartment at the back and one inner compartment. Adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Half-lined. Size 5x17.5x31 cm.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons at the top and short sleeves.

Set with a top and a dungaree dress in soft cotton. Top in jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short, frill-trimmed sleeves. Dungaree dress in woven fabric with a chest pocket, elastication at the back of the waist and straps with adjustable buttoning. Unlined.

Set with a top and a dungaree dress in soft cotton. Top in jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short, frill-trimmed sleeves. Dungaree dress in woven fabric with a chest pocket, elastication at the back of the waist and straps with adjustable buttoning. Unlined.

Low-cut body in microfibre with a light shaping effect on the waist and hips. Non-wired, push-up bra with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, and adjustable shoulder straps. Lined gusset and a high cut at the back. The body is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

Jazz trousers in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. High waist with concealed elastication, and straight-cut legs with flared hems.

Deck shoes with lacing at the top and a moccasin seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings, patterned imitation leather insoles and soles with a sturdy grip.

Calf-length dress in patterned satin with a V-neck and wrapover front with narrow ties that fasten at one side. Long balloon sleeves with a narrow trim and covered button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared, pleated skirt. Lined.
Loafers in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with decorative lacing at the top and a moccasin seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Fabric mule loafers with a metal decoration at the top. Imitation leather linings and insoles.

Small, crescent-shaped shoulder bag in imitation leather and imitation suede. Flap with a snap lock, a detachable, adjustable metal chain shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Lined. Depth 7 cm. Height 11 cm. Width 18 cm.
Calf-length trousers in jersey. High waist with covered elastication and wide, straight legs.
Calf-length trousers in jersey. High waist with covered elastication and wide, straight legs.

Large purse in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top and down the short sides. Eight card slots, two note compartments and a zipped coin compartment. Lined. Depth 2 cm. Height 10.5 cm. Width 20 cm.
Trousers in a cotton and linen weave with adjustable elastication and ties at the waist. Zip fly and button, side pockets and welt back pockets. Long legs with a tab and button.

Calf-length culottes in a crêpe weave. High waist with covered elastication, pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover top and seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist. Concealed zip and at the back, concealed pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top.
Joggers in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waist, fake fly, front and back pockets, and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in a patterned cotton weave with a lightly brushed finish. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with wide elastication and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Flared, calf-length skirt in flock-print tulle. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed cotton jersey with overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed cotton jersey with overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. High waist with concealed elastication and a gently bell-shaped flare to the hem. Unlined.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Top with adjustable, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, decorative gathers at the front and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bottoms.

Short dress in patterned plumeti chiffon with short, softly draping sleeves and an open section at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam under the bust, a concealed zip at the back and a gently flared skirt. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester.

Short dress in patterned plumeti chiffon with short, softly draping sleeves and an open section at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam under the bust, a concealed zip at the back and a gently flared skirt. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester.

Short dress in a lightly crinkled viscose weave with decorative embroidery and a V-shaped opening with covered buttons and twisted, tasselled ties at the front. Long sleeves with inset trims and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seams at the waist and hem for added width. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, gathers at the shoulders and short sleeves. Seam at the waist with a drawstring at the sides and gathered seams on the skirt for added width and soft draping. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck and button placket. Smocked seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and 3/4-length sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
3/4-length leggings in sturdy, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits at the hems.
3/4-length leggings in sturdy, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits at the hems.

3/4-length leggings in sturdy, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits at the hems.

Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.

Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Sweetheart neckline with narrow elastication at the back, and covered buttons down the front. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication around the shoulders and hems. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Partly lined.

Wide, straight-cut, knee-length shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back with a pleat for added width. Low dropped shoulders and long, voluminous balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Open chest pocket and a rounded hem with high slits in the sides. Unlined.

Wide, straight-cut, knee-length shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back with a pleat for added width. Low dropped shoulders and long, voluminous balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Open chest pocket and a rounded hem with high slits in the sides. Unlined.

Wide, straight-cut, knee-length shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back with a pleat for added width. Low dropped shoulders and long, voluminous balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Open chest pocket and a rounded hem with high slits in the sides. Unlined.

Calf-length lace dress with buttons at the top and a square neckline with a smocked edge and small frill trim. Short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the hems, and a flared skirt with seams that have small frill trims, and an overlocked hem. Underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.

Short dress in a viscose weave. Wrapover top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and wide ties at the waist. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim. Cut-out section at the front and a skirt with narrow elastication at the waist and a shorter tier layered over the top. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a crinkled weave with an embroidered pattern. V-neck with ties at the neckline, a smocked seam at the waist and long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow covered elastication at the cuffs. Jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
Knee-length, A-line dress in jersey with a gathered seam and flounce at the hem for added volume. Unlined.
